column1: in memory of martin lee heintz -- gary kelley's add'vantage funeral and cremation service| first: last: martin lee heintz february 6
column6: 2015 in tulsa. he was born february 6
column7: 1939 to john and alice (petrea) heintz in concord
column8: north carolina. he was an auto mechanic. no services planned. condolences may be posted to the guestbook located on this page. photographs and may also be submitted to this online memorial. gary kelley'sadd'vantage funeral and cremation service9761 east 31st street. tulsa
